habilidadesdesc: I'm a true believer of the fact that learning never stops, and I'm interested in learning new technologies and programming languages that helps me to improve even more my skills as Software Developer.
explabdesc1: I'm in charge of developing and designing the functionalities of the system under development according to the specifications proposed by the architects. In addition to carrying out the necessary test that the functionalities made by other developers must pass.
presentacion: Enthusiastic and skilled Fullstack Software Developer, specialized in web apps and web APIs development
presentacion2: I'm a lover of world of technology, specially programming, barely beginning my journey in said area. Always looking for learn the most I can and improve my skills as Software Developer.
formulario-error-msg: Something went wrong, try it again.
proyectodesc: Messaging app that allows sending instant messages to anyone.
proyectodesc2: Web game in which you control an ufo and you're in charge to avoid the ascending balloons reach the space.
proyectodesc3: ECommerce web site where you can buy and sell anything you want.
